entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
